entry.title: Stoicisme
entry.content:
This blog is dedicated to the people who want to improve their overall life by changing the way they perceive feelings and events that happen in their lives. Here we practice gratitude and a better mindset. This is the definition of stoicism in two quotes:

The happines of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts

Marcus Aurelius

Or

You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this and youâ€™ll find strength

Marcus Aurelius
